30201252-991c-43d6-8b49-4c94d7601acc.name: BTPrioritySelector
30201252-991c-43d6-8b49-4c94d7601acc.title: Pri: 防御塔AI
30201252-991c-43d6-8b49-4c94d7601acc.description: BTPrioritySelector selects the first sussessfully evaluated child as the active child.

669e9aec-3793-45e5-a4d9-8a752a9496c5.name: BTParallel
669e9aec-3793-45e5-a4d9-8a752a9496c5.title: Pal: 塔被控制
669e9aec-3793-45e5-a4d9-8a752a9496c5.description:
BTParallel evaluates all children, if any of them fails the evaluation, BTParallel fails.
BTParallel ticks all children, if flag
- false: 	ends when all children ends
- true: 	ends when any of the children ends
NOTE: Order of child node added does matter!

a7b92bab-a40a-45a3-891c-0e1f24b01397.name: BTParallel

- true: 	ends when any of the children ends

21f0c421-2d01-43d1-9e99-85903dba1e7d.description:
Action：查找目标
寻找区域内是否存在目标，存在则锁定该目标

191aae7f-b78e-450a-90e0-affca078d69f.title: Action: 开炮并设置冷却中

7873ae66-5e41-4fb8-8e1d-4727d88f1365.description: 需要冷却中和攻击后摇同时完成后才算已冷却

530c18d4-1d56-4d2d-8ccc-76b4fb65dfab.name: BTParallel

a36c3749-e2c7-4f35-8c90-967191f2ee46.name: BTSequence
a36c3749-e2c7-4f35-8c90-967191f2ee46.title: Seq; 进入攻击后摇
a36c3749-e2c7-4f35-8c90-967191f2ee46.description: 攻击后摇未完成过才会进入，已完成不会再次进入

8ecd2576-2672-441c-ae1a-27150a5a98d1.name: BTPrioritySelector
8ecd2576-2672-441c-ae1a-27150a5a98d1.title: Pri: ：当前有锁定单位

bf9c7e38-2542-4ddf-bb32-891b7a723eb9.name: BTSequence
bf9c7e38-2542-4ddf-bb32-891b7a723eb9.title: Seq:当前有锁定单位
bf9c7e38-2542-4ddf-bb32-891b7a723eb9.description:
BTSequence evaluteas the current active child, or the first child (if no active child).
If passed the evaluation, BTSequence ticks the current active child, or the first child (if no active child available), and if it's result is BTEnded, then change the active child to the next one.
